definitions.text: a volatile substance; a substance that changes readily from solid or liquid to a vapor
examples: it was heated to evaporate the volatiles

definitions.text: evaporating readily at normal temperatures and pressures
liable to lead to sudden change or violence
examples: a volatile situation with troops and rioters eager for a confrontation

definitions.text: marked by erratic changeableness in affections or attachments
tending to vary often or widely
